p: Dichloromethane and sodium sulfate anhydrous were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich. The standard of aliphatic hydrocarbons was purchased from CHEM SERVICE under the name of Diesel Range Organics Mixture #2-GRO/DRO and with the code M-TPH6X4-1ML. Helium was purchased from INDURA, Ecuador. All chemicals were of analytical grade and used without further purifications.
